response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which holds significant value to both parties. Given its worth to you and our company, we propose a transaction price of $1,350,000. This figure aims to be mutually beneficial, ensuring that it represents a fair valuation while allowing us to recoup a substantial portion of the product's worth. We believe this offer strikes the right balance between value and price, and we look forward to discussing how this product could enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our proposal.", "product_price": 1350000}
